attributes.action: force the Student Loans Company to reduce the rate of interest to -0.4% for all students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Student Loans Company have announced that the interest rate on student loans - meant to be set equal to RPI - shall only do so for people with pre-1998 loans. RPI in March, when they set the rate, was -0.4%, but post-1998 loan holders are being charged 0%. This is completely against the concept of student loans in maintaining their *real* value, not rising in nominal terms.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
